paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: AD-affected cousin pairs from high-risk pedigrees

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Cousin_1 was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease at age 72.
Cousin_2 was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease at age 76.

functional_data.summary: The TTR variant is associated with altered protein stability and function.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence from co-segregation and functional studies.
variants.additional_notes: The TTR variant was validated through co-segregation analysis.
key_quotes: These analyses support ABCA7 and TTR as AD risk genes.
The TTR variant c.289G>A was identified in multiple affected individuals.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text.
